about_project_1: The app was created as part of the project called Understanding Digital Collections, which explores how digital technologies can enhance the experience of a gallery visit and uses the principles of digital storytelling to engage with online collections.
about_project_2: The Understanding Digital Collections project has received a grant from Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway in the amount of 199,925 euros through EEA Grants. The project is co-financed in the amount of EUR 29 988,75 from the state budget of the Slovak Republic.
All works you enter the code for will be: All works you enter the code for will be automatically saved here.
More about artworks in the group: More about artworks in the group
We're constantly developing the app base: We're constantly developing the app based on feedback from people like you! Have an idea or a comment? Let us know via the short questionnaire.
Can I use the gallery WiFi?: Can I use the gallery wifi?
about_help_1: Use the password welcometosng to connect to the free SNG wifi.
How do I explore an artwork?: How do I explore an artwork?
about_help_2: Find the dot code near the artwork or the group of artworks. It is usually found next to the work's label in the exhibition. Tap the Enter code button in the bottom right corner. Insert the code pattern into the grid and press the Check code button. Try also inserting a random code and see what you discover.
What if I don't see a code?: What if I don't see a code?
about_help_3:
Some artworks don't have a code yet. We are working on adding the codes to the works as we go along.
If there is another artwork in the exhibition with a code by the same artist, you might find something interesting there.
Can I revisit artworks I've already expl: Can I revisit artworks I've already explored?
about_help_4: All reviewed works are automatically saved in your history. You can find them by tapping the eye icon in the top right corner. Your history will be preserved even after you close the application window.
How do I claim my reward for the Scaveng: How do I claim my reward for the Scavenger hunt?
about_help_5:
Once you've explored all the works in the current Scavenger hunt list, tap the See reward button on the Atlas homepage.
In the yellow box, you'll find instructions for the reward, which you can pick up either at the Ex Libris Bookstore or the SNG Café.
Discover artworks within the SNG premise: Find these artworks in the gallery, discover what they have in common and get a discount!
